citeinfo.origin: Far Eastern Hydrometerorogical Institute, Pacific Fisheries Research Center (TINRO-Center)
citeinfo.title: Peculiar Semi-centennial Variability of intensity and Geographic Position Anomalies of Atmospheric Action Centers in the Asian Pacific Region

descript.abstract: Atmospheric action center (AAC) are important for general atmospheric circulation. In Asian Pacific region four AACs are distinguished: North Pacific high, Aleutian low (permanent), winter Asian high and summer Asian low (seasonal). Mean yearly pressure, longitudinal and latitudinal anomalies of AACs registered in 1947-1994 are studied on the basis of World Hydrometeorological Data Center B.
descript.purpose: To show the peculiar Semi-centennial Variability of intensity and Geographic Position Anomalies of Atmospheric Action Centers in the Asian Pacific Region
